metadata.name: Measurement
metadata.description: Numeric measurement normalized to a canonical unit with optional uncertainty.

value.description: Numeric magnitude of the measurement after normalizing to the canonical unit.

unit.description: UCUM unit symbol representing the canonical unit (e.g., Cel, hPa, km/h).

display_unit.description: Optional unit symbol preferred for rendering when different from the canonical unit.

uncertainty.description: Optional plus/minus uncertainty expressed in the same unit as value.

timestamp.description: Optional timestamp indicating when this measurement was recorded.
